title: krSNAyanu mAnasA
sahitya:
krSNAyanu mAnasA


caraNam 1    krSNAyaninandakanu mA sukhamintA
    caraNam 2    manasondina vELa manasu nondina vELa
    caraNam 3    tuNtari tanamuna oNTari tanamuna
    caraNam 4    vidya nErcina vELa vidya nErpina vELa
    caraNam 5    kuduru lEkayunna nidura lEkayunna
    caraNam 6    pannaga shayanA Apanna shraya shamanA
    caraNam 7    shikhi pincamauLi karadhrta muraLI
